featured.text: Up until recently, the only way for a Maasai boy to achieve warrior status was to single-handedly kill a lion with his spear.

definition.zh_def: 用手或手的方式，通常指某種行為或方式。
definition.en_def: In a manner involving the use of hands or in a specific way.
definition.example: She handedly completed the project on her own.
